Layer.InitCommand: %function(self) if not OatProfile().OATResultRate then self:hidden(1) end end

Layer.UpdateCommand: %function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(1);self:decelerate(0.5) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('MarvelousNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125); self:rainbow() elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end

%function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(1.25);self:decelerate(0.5) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('PerfectNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125); self:rainbow() elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end

%function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(1.5);self:decelerate(0.5) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('GreatNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125); self:rainbow() elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end

%function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(1.75);self:decelerate(0.5) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('GoodNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125); self:rainbow() elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end

%function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(2);self:decelerate(0.5) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('BooNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125); self:rainbow() elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end

%function(self) if OatProfile().OATResultText==2 then self:sleep(2.25);self:decelerate(1) end if otaJudgeTotalP2>0 then local count=tonumber(SCREENMAN:GetTopScreen():GetChild('MissNumberP2'):GetText()) if count==otaJudgeTotalP2 then self:zoomx(125) elseif count~=0 then self:zoomx(math.min(124,math.ceil(count/otaJudgeTotalP2*125))) end end end
